bug.author: tc87
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
A community member noticed a "cannot hash of type" issue. More information can be found in <denchmark-link:https://discuss.streamlit.io/t/unhashabletype-cannot-hash-object-of-type-thread-local/1917>this forum discussion</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-h:h1>Full error message</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26268394/76034693-79fee300-5ef4-11ea-9675-2c2c0a24fd16.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Closing this out as a duplicate of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/issues/1190>#1190</denchmark-link> . All updates will be tracked on that issue going forward.
